Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.payroll

Interface PaymentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PaymentServiceImpl
public interface PaymentService
This interface represents the service contract for handling payments at Buffett Inc. It declares all the necessary CRUD operations related to Payment along with some additional methods.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

  • Method Details

    • saveOrUpdatePayment

      Payment saveOrUpdatePayment(Payment payment)
      Saves a new payment or updates an existing one.
      Parameters:
      payment - the payment to save or update.
      Returns:
      the saved or updated payment.

    • getPaymentById

      Optional<Payment> getPaymentById(UUID paymentID)
      Fetches a payment by its id.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - the id of the payment to fetch.
      Returns:
      an Optional of the payment if found, or an empty Optional if not.

    • getAllPayments

      List<Payment> getAllPayments()
      Fetches all payments.
      Returns:
      a list of all payments.

    • deletePayment

      void deletePayment(UUID paymentID)
      Deletes a payment by its id.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - the id of the payment to delete.

    • getPaymentsForEmployee

      List<Payment> getPaymentsForEmployee(UUID employeeID)
      Fetches all payments for a particular employee.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - the id of the employee.
      Returns:
      a list of payments for the employee.

    • initiateDirectDepositTransfer

      Payment initiateDirectDepositTransfer(UUID paymentID)
      Initiates a direct deposit transfer for the given payment.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - the id of the payment.
      Returns:
      an updated payment with the direct deposit transfer initiated.

    • acknowledgeDirectDeposit

      Payment acknowledgeDirectDeposit(UUID paymentID)
      Acknowledges a direct deposit for the given payment.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - the id of the payment.
      Returns:
      an updated payment with the direct deposit acknowledged.

    • initiateCheckWriting

      Payment initiateCheckWriting(UUID paymentID)
      Initiates a check writing for the given payment.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - the id of the payment.
      Returns:
      an updated payment with the check writing initiated.
